frontmatter.title: Sentiment Analysis of Customer Reviews using Natural Language Processing

node.html: Analyzing the reviews given to the hotels and applying the aspect analysis and topic modelling.

frontmatter.title: Predicting Life Expectancy Rate using Machine Learning

node.html: The Average Life Expectancy of inividuals from different countries is predicted based on various factors like sex differences, mental illness, physical illness, GDP, economic differences, education and other demographic factors.

frontmatter.title: Forest Fire Prediction Using Machine Learning

node.html: A simple project to predict destructiveness of forest fire using various supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithm.
